text: 5:2 Aghuzir Akaba 10:19; Matyu 6:7Nɨ faragh navir averiamɨn aven deravɨra nɨghnigh, gɨn dɨkavigh uan akatorimɨn mɨkɨm. Egh nɨ God ko mɨgeir dughiamɨn mɨgɨrɨgɨar avɨribar amuan markɨ. God a gavgavir ekiam ikia uan Nguibamɨn iti, ezɨ e gumazir kɨniba nguazir kamɨn iti. Kamaghɨn, nɨ an damazimɨn mɨgɨrɨgɨar avɨribar a damuan markɨ.
